Description.p: The ilon account uses a password of "ilon". This would allow anyone to log into the machine via FTP and take complete control of the application.

Solution.summary: Fix Default ilon account: ilon password: "ilon"

workaround.p:
Change the password to a non-default value. The software and services associated with this credential are known to have multiple security issues and are not to be made available to non adminsitrative staff.
https://power.cummins.com/sites/default/files/900-0545_I3iWatch100.pdf
